Key Match Events: Jalen Brunson scored 26 points in the first half
Karl-Anthony Towns scored 25 points in the fourth quarter
Chicago Bulls outscored the Knicks 41-17 in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Karl-Anthony Towns took 13 shots in the game against Oklahoma City, which is unusually low for the best player on the team
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks have not faced any significant tests this season
The Knicks' inability to compete with the league’s top teams raises doubts about whether New York is truly a championship contender
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks started 2025 on a positive note, defeating the Jazz; however, they now have a record of 1-2 to begin the new calendar year
Others: The Knicks' defensive rating has been among the worst during this two-game stretch
Five players from the Bulls scored in double figures, highlighting the Knicks’ lack of depth
